name: Scion of Ugin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: For hundreds of years Ugin slept, encased in the cocoon of stone and magic Sarkhan had created using a shard of a Zendikari hedron. As Ugin lay dormant, his spectral guardians kept vigil.

name: Abzan Battle Priest
oracle_text: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.
flavor_text: "Wherever I walk, the ancestors walk too."

name: Abzan Falconer
oracle_text: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.
flavor_text: The fastest way across the dunes is above.

name: Ainok Bond-Kin
oracle_text: Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.
flavor_text: "Hold the line, for family and the fallen!"

name: Ajani's Pridemate
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
flavor_text:
"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane

name: Angel of Mercy
oracle_text: Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Every tear shed is a drop of immortality.

name: Angelic Accord
oracle_text: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor_text: As demons are drawn to suffering, angels are drawn to acts of benevolence.

name: Archangel of Thune
oracle_text: Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor_text: Even the wicked have nightmares.

name: Auriok Champion
oracle_text: Protection from black and from red
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Mirrodin's deepest caverns conceal its brightest hopes.

name: Austere Command
oracle_text: Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance, indestructible
Other permanents you control have indestructible.
flavor_text: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

name: Benevolent Ancestor
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

name: Blinding Mage
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

name: Burrenton Forge-Tender
oracle_text: Protection from red
Sacrifice Burrenton Forge-Tender: Prevent all damage a red source of your choice would deal this turn.
flavor_text: "We are a clachan of smiths. The forge is as comfortable to us as a small fire during a cool winter's evening."

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever."
—Song of All, canto 881

name: Doomed Traveler
oracle_text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

name: Dragon Bell Monk
oracle_text: Vigilance
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: He has spent years training his eyes and ears to detect the subtle signs of a dragon's approach.

name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
oracle_text: Vigilance
Other creatures you control get +2/+2.
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.
flavor_text: "The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist, we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them."

name: Emerge Unscathed
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Emeria Angel
oracle_text: Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
flavor_text: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

name: Great Teacher's Decree
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Guard Duty
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender.
flavor_text: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

name: Guided Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade."
—Nomad war prayer

name: Infantry Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Swords, to me! We must engage their line to protect our archers and mages. Let no one fail this task!"

name: Iona's Judgment
oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

name: Path of Bravery
oracle_text: As long as your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain life equal to the number of attacking creatures.

name: Pentarch Ward
oracle_text: Enchant creature
As Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color.
When Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Pentarch Ward.

name: Restoration Angel
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

name: Seeker of the Way
oracle_text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Seeker of the Way gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I don't know where my destiny lies, but I know it isn't here."

name: Serra Angel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

name: Serra Ascendant
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
As long as you have 30 or more life, Serra Ascendant gets +5/+5 and has flying.
flavor_text: Faith in Serra is its own reward.

name: Stalwart Aven
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

name: Student of Ojutai
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Human enlightenment is a firefly that sparks in the night. Dragon enlightenment is a beacon that disperses all darkness."

name: Survival Cache
oracle_text: You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Sustainer of the Realm
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

name: Swords to Plowshares
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor_text: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

name: Topan Freeblade
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
flavor_text: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

name: Wing Shards
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Yosei, the Morning Star
oracle_text: Flying
When Yosei, the Morning Star dies, target player skips their next untap step. Tap up to five target permanents that player controls.
flavor_text: The caress of the morning star frees all from the clutch of darkness.

name: Aetherize
oracle_text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

name: Amass the Components
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: "I knew I'd find a use for all that newt spittle!"

name: Ancestral Vision
oracle_text: Suspend 4—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Target player draws three cards.

name: Bewilder
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension."
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Cephalid Broker
oracle_text: {T}: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.
flavor_text: Cephalids value the free exchange of ideas—except for the "free" part.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Condescend
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: "Shame we'll never see what all the fuss was about."

name: Consecrated Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.
flavor_text: Blessed by the hands of Jin-Gitaxias.

name: Cryptic Command
oracle_text: Choose two —
• Counter target spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Tap all creatures your opponents control.
• Draw a card.

name: Day of the Dragons
oracle_text: When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.
When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

name: Diminish
oracle_text: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Everything seems a little less ferocious when it's running from a house cat.

name: Dissolve
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

name: Distortion Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Doorkeeper
oracle_text: Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
flavor_text: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

name: Elusive Spellfist
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Elusive Spellfist gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Learn to see an obstacle from a new perspective. Underneath, for example."
—Chanyi, Ojutai monk

name: Flusterstorm
oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Fog Bank
oracle_text: Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.
flavor_text:
"The union of sea and sky makes a perfect cover."
—Talrand, sky summoner

name: Frost Lynx
oracle_text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

name: Illusory Ambusher
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Whenever Illusory Ambusher is dealt damage, draw that many cards.
flavor_text:
"Violence is the food it craves. Feed it if you dare."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

name: Illusory Angel
oracle_text: Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn.
Flying
flavor_text:
"In a daze, I woke and looked upon the battlefield, where I could swear my dreams were laying waste to the enemy."
—Letter from a soldier

name: Jace's Phantasm
oracle_text: Flying
Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.
flavor_text: In the abstract memories of the Iquati, Jace found interesting ideas to improve upon.

name: Jhessian Thief
oracle_text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Jhessian Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Where's the fun in an escape if it's not at least a little daring?"

name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
oracle_text: Flash
At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards.
Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.
flavor_text: "It is not a goal, but a process—the process of creating the perfect Phyrexia."

name: Keiga, the Tide Star
oracle_text: Flying
When Keiga, the Tide Star dies, gain control of target creature.
flavor_text: The pull of the tide star holds eternal sway.

name: Mahamoti Djinn
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

name: Mana Drain
oracle_text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: Enthusiasm is no match for preparation.

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Mnemonic Wall
oracle_text: Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?"
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Ojutai's Breath
oracle_text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Phantom Monster
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Is it an amalgamation of faded memories or the projection of a half-remembered dream? Neither answer offers any comfort.

name: Repeal
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator

name: Riverwheel Aerialists
oracle_text: Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Adepts of the Riverwheel Stronghold can run through rain and never get wet; masters use the raindrops as stepping stones.

name: Shriekgeist
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Shriekgeist deals combat damage to a player, that player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: Wounds of the flesh are easy to heal. Wounds of the mind may never be undone.

name: Skywise Teachings
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Ojutai's words must be translated from Draconic before his students can benefit from their wisdom.

name: Sphinx of Uthuun
oracle_text: Flying

When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash.
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.

name: Thought Scour
oracle_text: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"As you inject the viscus vitae into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears."
—Stitcher Geralf

name: Windfall
oracle_text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
flavor_text: "Rich" is a relative term.

name: Abyssal Persecutor
oracle_text: Flying, trample
You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.
flavor_text: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.

name: Bala Ged Scorpion
oracle_text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.
flavor_text: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

name: Balustrade Spy
oracle_text: Flying
When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

name: Bladewing's Thrall
oracle_text: Bladewing's Thrall has flying as long as you control a Dragon.
When a Dragon enters the battlefield, you may return Bladewing's Thrall from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: A shadow of life chasing a husk of glory.

name: Bloodghast
oracle_text: Bloodghast can't block.
Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Bogbrew Witch
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "The hardest thing is finding the right ingredients."

name: Butcher's Glee
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Dead Reveler
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: He's the unlife of the party.

name: Doom Blade
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."
—Liliana Vess

name: Eternal Thirst
oracle_text: Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Festering Newt
oracle_text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.
flavor_text: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

name: Foul-Tongue Invocation
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Target player sacrifices a creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, you gain 4 life.

name: Grisly Spectacle
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Haunting Hymn
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that player discards four cards instead.
flavor_text: The hymn's melody has persisted since Tourach's time, but the words changed to invoke the phobias of each listener.

name: Indulgent Tormentor
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.
flavor_text: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

name: Kokusho, the Evening Star
oracle_text: Flying
When Kokusho, the Evening Star dies, each opponent loses 5 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: The fall of the evening star never heralds a gentle dawn.

name: Lord of the Pit
oracle_text: Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.
flavor_text: "My summoning begins your debt, Planeswalker."

name: Mer-Ek Nightblade
oracle_text: Outlast {B} ({B}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has deathtouch.

name: Necropotence
oracle_text: Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

name: Night of Souls' Betrayal
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1.
flavor_text:
"How can we wage war against ourselves? What happens when the kami of our very souls rise against us? I answer simply: We cannot. We die. There can be no victory in this war."
—Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

name: Noxious Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.
flavor_text: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.

name: Ob Nixilis, the Fallen
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose 3 life. If you do, put three +1/+1 counters on Ob Nixilis, the Fallen.
flavor_text: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Rakdos Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Rakdos rioters paint their faces to resemble the drakes' bloodied muzzles.

name: Reave Soul
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."
—Liliana Vess

name: Rotfeaster Maggot
oracle_text: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.
flavor_text: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

name: Rune-Scarred Demon
oracle_text: Flying
When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

name: Sanguine Bond
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
flavor_text:
"Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed."
—Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

name: Tavern Swindler
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.
flavor_text: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

name: Thoughtseize
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

name: Ulcerate
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.
flavor_text:
"If it were merely lethal, that would be sufficient. The art, however, is in maximizing the suffering it causes."
—Liliana Vess

name: Virulent Swipe
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Wight of Precinct Six
oracle_text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.
flavor_text: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

name: Wrench Mind
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card.
flavor_text: What is the sound of one head snapping?

name: Anger of the Gods
oracle_text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

name: Bogardan Hellkite
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

name: Borderland Marauder
oracle_text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

name: Charmbreaker Devils
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

name: Coordinated Assault
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

name: Crucible of Fire
oracle_text: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.
flavor_text:
"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Draconic Roar
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

name: Dragon Egg
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor_text: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

name: Dragon Tempest
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

name: Dragonlord's Servant
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Earth Elemental
flavor_text: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

name: Fireball
oracle_text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.
flavor_text: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

name: Furnace Whelp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

name: Fury Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card.

name: Guttersnipe
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: "I found a new toy. Wanna play?"

name: Hammerhand
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)

name: Heat Ray
oracle_text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Hoarding Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle your library.
When Hoarding Dragon dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

name: Keldon Halberdier
oracle_text: First strike

Suspend 4—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
oracle_text: Haste
{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Kiln Fiend
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

name: Magus of the Moon
oracle_text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
flavor_text: Tidal forces of the blood moon wrench and buckle the land, drawing monoliths of stone and soil toward the flaming orb.

name: Mark of Mutiny
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

name: Monastery Swiftspear
oracle_text: Haste
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

name: Pillar of Flame
oracle_text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

name: Prodigal Pyromancer
oracle_text: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

name: Rift Bolt
oracle_text: Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
oracle_text: Flying
When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: The course of the falling star always ends in ruin.

name: Scourge of Valkas
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Scourge of Valkas or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.
{R}: Scourge of Valkas gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Splatter Thug
oracle_text: First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

name: Staggershock
oracle_text: Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Surreal Memoir
oracle_text: Return an instant card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Thundermaw Hellkite
oracle_text: Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
When Thundermaw Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control. Tap those creatures.

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned."
—Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

name: Urabrask the Hidden
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste.
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: When the Mirran resistance arrived, the furnace dwellers looked to Urabrask for guidance. His decree stunned the others: "Let them be."

name: Vent Sentinel
oracle_text: Defender
{1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.
flavor_text:
"Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone."
—The War Diaries

name: Aerial Predation
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

name: Assault Formation
oracle_text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
{G}: Target creature with defender can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
{2}{G}: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

name: Carven Caryatid
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

name: Channel
oracle_text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
flavor_text: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

name: Crowned Ceratok
oracle_text: Trample
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

name: Curse of Predation
oracle_text: Enchant player
Whenever a creature attacks enchanted player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"Hunters feed on the fear of their prey."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Durkwood Baloth
oracle_text: Suspend 5—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Duskdale Wurm
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text:
"Last time, it tore up the Wilt-Leaf, turned Mistmeadow into a mudhole, and made the river jump its banks. On the bright side, we were eating venison for weeks."
—Donal Alloway, cenn of Kinscaer

name: Enlarge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (If a creature with trample would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: For Mittens, it was just another day at the beach.

name: Genesis Hydra
oracle_text: When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library.
Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Genesis Wave
oracle_text: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

name: Greater Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

name: Heroes' Bane
oracle_text: Heroes' Bane enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on Heroes' Bane, where X is its power.
flavor_text: Travelers' tales claim that hydras bite off their own heads to make themselves deadlier.

name: Hunt the Weak
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Dragons scorn the weak, even among their own kind.

name: Hunting Pack
oracle_text: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Inspiring Call
oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family—charge!"

name: Ivy Elemental
oracle_text: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

name: Jaddi Offshoot
oracle_text: Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: On Murasa, even the trees grow trees.

name: Jugan, the Rising Star
oracle_text: Flying
When Jugan, the Rising Star dies, you may distribute five +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.
flavor_text: The light of the rising star empowers the champions of tomorrow.

name: Lead the Stampede
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Lotus Cobra
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Its scales contain the essence of thousands of lotus blooms.

name: Lure
oracle_text: Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
flavor_text: It makes the insignificant conspicuous, the repulsive alluring, and the deadly irresistible.

name: Nantuko Shaman
oracle_text: When Nantuko Shaman enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, draw a card.

Suspend 1—{2}{G}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G}{G} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Nature's Claim
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."
—Sildark, artificer of Omu

name: Netcaster Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

name: Obstinate Baloth
oracle_text: When Obstinate Baloth enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Obstinate Baloth, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

name: Overgrown Battlement
oracle_text: Defender
{T}: Add {G} for each creature with defender you control.
flavor_text:
"Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies."
—The War Diaries

name: Phantom Tiger
oracle_text: Phantom Tiger enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.

name: Prey's Vengeance
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Primeval Titan
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: When nature calls, run.

name: Rampaging Baloths
oracle_text: Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text:
"When the land is angry, so are they."
—Nissa Revane

name: Search for Tomorrow
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Sultai Flayer
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."

name: Timberland Guide
oracle_text: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Can you build a fire? Track a deer? Identify killer trees? Then you'll never survive Kessig without me."

name: Undercity Troll
oracle_text: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
{2}{G}: Regenerate Undercity Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Wall of Roots
oracle_text: Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Mana grows and changes like the roots of a plant. Like a plant, it must be nurtured."
—Nissa Revane

name: Wildsize
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Azorius Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
• Draw a card.
• Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

name: Bladewing the Risen
oracle_text: Flying
When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Blizzard Specter
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Blizzard Specter deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• That player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand.
• That player discards a card.

name: Blood Baron of Vizkopa
oracle_text: Lifelink, protection from white and from black
As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, Blood Baron of Vizkopa gets +6/+6 and has flying.

name: Chronicler of Heroes
oracle_text: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.

name: Corpsejack Menace
oracle_text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
flavor_text: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.

name: Electrolyze
oracle_text: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

name: Firemane Angel
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
{6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Glimpse the Unthinkable
oracle_text: Target player puts the top ten cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir."
—Szadek

name: Hypersonic Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, haste
You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor_text:
"Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive."
—Niv-Mizzet

name: Jungle Barrier
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: Within silent clearings guarded by living palisades, the natural world guards its most precious secrets.

name: Knight of the Reliquary
oracle_text: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"Knowledge of Bant's landscape and ruins is a weapon that the invaders can't comprehend."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Lightning Helix
oracle_text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Rage is not the answer. Rage followed by fitting vengeance is the answer."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Malfegor
oracle_text: Flying
When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.
flavor_text: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

name: Rosheen Meanderer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}.
flavor_text: Night after night, Rosheen babbled about a bygone sunlit world, her every word dismissed as a madwoman's ravings.

name: Savageborn Hydra
oracle_text: Double strike
Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Simic Sky Swallower
oracle_text: Flying, trample
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."
—Momir Vig

name: Spiritmonger
oracle_text: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.
{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.
{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Supreme Verdict
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Destroy all creatures.
flavor_text: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

name: Vizkopa Guildmage
oracle_text: {1}{W}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
{1}{W}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

name: Aether Vial
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial.
{T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Bubbling Cauldron
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature named Festering Newt: Each opponent loses 4 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

name: Darksteel Axe
oracle_text: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.)
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: Heavier than it looks, tricky to wield, guaranteed to last.

name: Dragonloft Idol
oracle_text: As long as you control a Dragon, Dragonloft Idol gets +1/+1 and has flying and trample.
flavor_text: The idols were forged during the time of the Khanfall, when the dragons came to rule Tarkir and its people aligned themselves with the five dragonlords.

name: Guardian Idol
oracle_text: Guardian Idol enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}: Guardian Idol becomes a 2/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn.

name: Kolaghan Monument
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{4}{B}{R}: Kolaghan Monument becomes a 4/4 black and red Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kolaghan has no lasting home, but her disciples leave relics to mark her conquests.

name: Manakin
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text:
"Each night, the artificer tucked the little doll into a locked drawer. Each morning, she awoke to find it waiting beside her with some new bauble."
—"The Artificer's Apprentice"

name: Mind Stone
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?"
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Mindcrank
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent loses life, that player puts that many cards from the top of their library into their graveyard. (Damage dealt by sources without infect causes loss of life.)
flavor_text:
"Let go of your memories and be reborn."
—Argent Etchings, plate 106, passage 27

name: Mishra's Bauble
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Moonglove Extract
oracle_text: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

name: Oblivion Stone
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

name: Palladium Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text: The myr are like the Glimmervoid: blank canvases on which to build grand creations.

name: Pristine Talisman
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Runed Servitor
oracle_text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

name: Sandstone Oracle
oracle_text: Flying
When Sandstone Oracle enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

name: Serum Powder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
Any time you could mulligan and Serum Powder is in your hand, you may exile all the cards from your hand, then draw that many cards. (You can do this in addition to taking mulligans.)

name: Star Compass
oracle_text: Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.
flavor_text: It doesn't point north. It points home.

name: Thran Dynamo
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
flavor_text: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

name: Trepanation Blade
oracle_text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, defending player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card. The creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card revealed this way. That player puts the revealed cards into their graveyard.
Equip {2}

name: Azorius Chancery
oracle_text: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}{U}.

name: Boros Garrison
oracle_text: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.
When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{W}.

name: Dimir Aqueduct
oracle_text: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{B}.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The land is ever resilient. Should it die, it will be reborn.

name: Golgari Rot Farm
oracle_text: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped.
When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{G}.

name: Graven Cairns
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Shamans of Kar-Sengir claim that their sun sets because it can no longer bear the gaze of those pain-carved cliffs.

name: Grove of the Burnwillows
